data.title: Burbank Unified School District
data.text:
Horace Mann Feasibility Study

Earlier this year, at the Board of Education’s meeting on February 2, 2023, the Burbank Unified School District’s Board approved a contract with Perkins Eastman architects to undertake the creation of a 2023 Facilities Master Plan. Attached is a helpful explanation of the purpose and timing of this critical task to evaluate all district properties to create a roadmap for facility investment for the next 10-15 years.

Accounting Error Overview & Next Steps

An overview regarding the accounting error that was presented at the Board of Education meeting on June 15, 2023

Williams Uniform Complaint Rights

There should be sufficient textbooks and instructional materials. For there to be sufficient textbooks and instructional materials, each pupil, including English learners, must have a textbook or instructional material, or both, to use in class and to take home. Click the title for more information.

Uniform Complaint Procedures Rights

It is the policy of the Burbank Unified School District to comply with the following: TITLE VI COMPLIANCE: Title VI of the Civil Right Act of 1964, TITLE IX COMPLIANCE: Title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972, and SECTION 504 COMPLIANCE: Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973. Click the title for more information
